artist: Artist: Auguste Louis Lepère; Author: Charles Morice
description: softcover book with text and color images of fashionable ladies; cover image of woman in green dress and hat wearing large black hat, picking an orange off a garland and handing it to a girl wearing a white dress with orange and black trim
provenance: [Richard Reed Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 2005; sold in April for $1,100, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2005-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Paris-Almanach
